colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @041A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHAL BCU GCIG @041B PA GRUB DBANG DPAL MO LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I SNANG BA GSAR DNGOM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA HU THOG THU, STAG PHU SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, ,CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MKHAN ZUR SKU SKYE RAB 'BYAMS PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS, LHA LDAN SPRO BA DE DAG GSAR BA'I DKAR PO PHYOGS BRGYAD PA SPYI TSOGS DANG, 'BRES SPUNGS SGO MANG AOR DU SU PA'I SE RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I SHOG DKA' BCU KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO, BDE YANG RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG NOR BU SOGS NAS BSKUL MA RIM PAR BYUNG BAR BRTEN RTZOM 'DUN THOG NYE CHAR KHAL KHAN SA DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA KHE PA'I AAM PANG PA'I SE TSE MCHOG SKYABS KYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, DPAL DGON @042A *, ,'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DANG, GRUB BRNYES DPAL MOS MDZAD PA'I RGYA GZHUNG SOGS LA GZHIGS, GTZO CHER PHYAG NA PADMO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'JUG PA BDE BAR BRTEN DAR SO CHE BAR 'DUG PAS DE NYID GZHIR BZUNG, MKHAS GRUB CHAD LDAN GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I CHO GA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG BZYES SOGS NAS KHA 'GONGS 'OS KYIS LEGS PAR BRGYAN TE, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAR KHAN DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG YON TAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
